newsitem.title: USA: Spyglass software included in Microsoft kit.
newsitem.headline: Spyglass software included in Microsoft kit.

text.p: Spyglass Inc said Tuesday its SurfWatch content filtering software will be included in all retail versions of the Microsoft Corp Internet Explorer Starter Kit.
SurfWatch allows users to block some content.

"The Internet Explorer Starter Kit is aimed at new Internet users, including many families with children. It's especially important that they have a way to block access to objectionable or other unwanted online material," said David Fester, Internet Explorer product manager in the Internet platform and tools division of Microsoft Corp, in a news release.
The Internet Explorer Starter Kit is scheduled to be available Tuesday as a stand-alone retail product, for about $24.95, software company Spyglass said.
Spyglass stock jumped 2 to 18-3/8 on Nasdaq Tuesday.
